case.state: You'd best believe it, Fina!
A game of cards? What a lovely way to relax. With such delights for the victors...
My, oh my... I'm not the greatest at cards, but I don't mind indulging you a bit. Provided you entertain me later as well.
Oh... you want to play that kind of game with me? Well... I suppose that could be a form of punishment...
A game of cards? What a lovely way to relax.
My, oh my... I'm not the greatest at cards, but I don't mind indulging you a bit.
Oh... you want to play that kind of game with me? Well... I suppose that could be a form of pampering...
My oh my! It would seem that even a god may need my love and affection from time to time. Very well. Let's have a wonderful game, ~name~!
Some manner of god? Very well. I suppose even divine beings besides myself need my tender love and care!
Ah! Are you some kind of yokai...? Or perhaps one of those kemonomimi people find so fashionable?
Well, I guess we could hear each other before we saw each other, neh? It's good to see another person with animal ears. It makes me feel right at home, even outside the Realm of Foxes.
Hyoung... I don't suppose people are always asking to play with your tail, are they, ~name~?
While I imagine my tail is fluffier, I do not suppose your own tail is wanting for attention, neh, ~name~?
A demon is just a spirit with a dirty soul. Let's cleanse that darkness, ~name~.
If I know anything, it's that even the most savage of demons just needs some care to start behaving like a normal spirit. Let's see how we can help you, ~name~.
Ah, moshi moshi.
Lucky you, ~name~. Few people of our homeland get to be blessed by a kitsune. I endeavor to make it an experience worth recording.
I see you're dismissing even the pretense of making a game of this...
This is supposed to be a competitive, stimulating card game... not a brothel, you know?
...You're not getting to fluff my tail with that attitude.
...We may have to see the game through, but don't expect me to be terribly pleased by your decision to rush.
Why thank you, Aoba. I do brush it and keep a healthy diet.
It's not a terrible amount of investment, but it is a labor of self love!
Why thank you, Aoba. I do brush it and keep a healthy diet.
It's not a terrible amount of investment, but it is a labor of self love!
Goodness, thank you, Ms. Ringo. I imagine tonight we'll be solving quite the puzzle together!
...~Player~... do you really want to be punished? You ought not to feel the need to guilt yourself, there's plenty of time in Hell to for us to do so.
~Player~, do you... you don't need everyone to be mean to you, I hope you know. Just those with sufficient understanding of the weight of your sins.
Why... clearly it's me you wish to punish, don't you think, you naughty person? Just to hold me in your hands and do with me what you wish?
Oh~... I can't ever imagine what to do with myself. Perhaps a naughty little fox as myself might serve to be punished, ~player~.
Ara, ara. You've been such a naughty little ~player.ifMale(boy|girl)~. Do you need Senko to punish you into behaving?
Ara, ara... asking me to pamper you when you've been so naughty. ~Player~, let's make sure we shame you into feeling punished, neh?
Just because I'm going to punish you doesn't mean you're going to get to enjoy it, ~player~...
Summoning a cute demon girl may yet be your undoing, ~player~...
Myo~n~! You really could use a pick me up today, can't you, ~player~?
Oh! You need a pick-me-up after a long day, hm? Onyo~~
A gathering of yokai? How exciting!
Goodness! Had I known we were gathering so many yokai in one place, I'd have brought far more exotic clothing to provide a truly otherworldly experience!
To prepare so admirably only to undress. What a curious assortment we have, ~player~!
My oh my... it would seem we've dressed to impress. And to undress in the same manner.
Oh, I see. Have you brought along a voice of experience to guide these precocious youths...?
...You do realize this isn't a uniform, don't you, ~player~? If you want me to instruct these children, so be it, as long as they are happy to learn.
...I can't help but feel a little intimidated by the others... is causing me discomfort truly gratifying for you, ~player~??
~Player~, while doubtless these souls could use soothing, I am not quite so sure that I am an appropriate person to bear such cause or responsibility.
Why... clearly it's me you wish to pamper, don't you think? Just to hold me in your hands and do with me what you wish?
W-wow... ~Player~... why, I don't know what to do with myself. Perhaps you should tell me exactly what you want, so that I can listen more attentively?
Ara, ara. You've been such a naughty little ~player.ifMale(boy|girl)~. Do you need Senko to punish you into behaving?
Ara, ara... asking me to pamper you when you've been so naughty. ~Player~, let's make sure we shame you into feeling pampering, neh?
My oh my... we're all so tiny and petite! Like little porcelain dolls. Are you going to play with us, ~player~?
Curious. Most of us might require some help reaching the higher shelves. Doubtless you'd help us, wouldn't you, ~player~?
...~Player~... do you really want to be pampered? You ought not to feel the need to guilt yourself...
~Player~, do you... you don't need everyone to be mean to you, I hope you know.
Oh... All ladies tonight?
Oh, goodness. I had expected at least one man... but this should be quite fun, neh?
O-oh... just me and a bunch of men playing... strip poker. Part of me likes where this is going, but parts of me are wondering if they'd be a little less accommodating than I'd like.
G-goodness. It really is just me and four men...? While I pride myself on being an accommodating host, there's only so much of me to go around, you know?
Just because I'm going to pamper you doesn't mean you're going to win for free, ~player~...!
Myo~n! I'll have you know I didn't live 800 years to be inept at card games...!
I'm not going to go easy on you. If you're in a competitive mood, you should get to really compete, neh?
Well, well. Is the dealer trying to pamper me, I wonder? Or punish you, ~player~?
Perfection from the draw.
Well, well. Is the dealer trying to pamper me, I wonder?
What? None of these are good...!
These are all awful!
...~Cards.text~.
Ah...
~Cards.text~, please.
Ah. ~Cards.text~, now.
~Cards.text~...
Hm...
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. If you'd please.
I'll keep these... and you give me ~cards.text~.
I would like ~cards.text~.
Could you give me ~cards.text~?
Ahah!
Well... I see. ~Cards.text~, then.
I'd prefer ~cards.text~ for these, if you would be so kind.
Please replace ~cards.text~, dealer.
Dealer, give me ~cards.text~ more cards.
~Cards.text~, if you'd please.
Please give me ~cards.text~.
Now now, you did ask for a competition. You'd best be prepared to gamble with your life?
Since I will fully win this hand, I can use this time to plan other manners of punishing you.
It would hardly be fun if I did not persist, don't you think? A little pleasure of mine to join with your pain?
An excellent hand. Now, stripping you naked just makes it easier for me to draw you a bath. A scalding, painful one.
Are you perhaps distracted? I've drawn the best cards in the deck, so perhaps you could focus more easily with a full stomach. Whatever will we fill it with?
Experience is a gift. One I intend to give repeatedly, even if that experience is only the process of learning. And pain is an excellent teacher...
I intimately understand the balance between pleasure and pain. Perhaps the suffering that the rest of you are experiencing comes to mind?
Part of the experience is the risk of defeat, is it not? In this I promise to provide you with the utmost punishing!
I must admit, I'm not used to being punished myself. But such a winning streak is appealing. Perhaps I ought to grant it to one of you...
Wondering what lewd opportunities I've experienced over the course of my long life are doubtless a curiosity left to explore, hm? Every torment, every iota of suffering... Played over and over.
Now now, you did ask for a competition.
Since I will fully win this hand, I can use this time to plan other manners of pampering you.
It would hardly be fun if I did not persist, don't you think?
An excellent hand. Now, stripping you naked just makes it easier for me to draw you a bath.
Are you perhaps distracted? I've drawn the best cards in the deck, so perhaps you could focus more easily with a full stomach.
Myon~
If you're trying to respect your elders by giving me the best cards, I'm just going to have to spoil you in return.
Hymm hymm hymm~ ♪
Do not fret about your upcoming defeat. A sore ego just needs some massaging, myon~?
Now... who will be the victor?
Experience is a gift. One I intend to give repeatedly, even if that experience is only the process of learning.
While I don't understand it, some people rather enjoy a bit of pain with their pleasure. Perhaps that's the sentiment the rest of you are experiencing?
Part of the experience is the risk of defeat, is it not? In this I promise to provide you with the utmost pampering!
I must admit, I'm not used to being pampered myself. But such a winning streak is appealing. Perhaps I ought to grant it to one of you...
Wondering what lewd opportunities I've experienced over the course of my long life are doubtless a curiosity left to explore, hm?
My oh my... what do we have here?
Myon~ ♪
Well... this shall certainly be interesting! For me, at least.
Certainly not the worst hand... But I suppose ~player~'s still got both of ~player.ifMale(his|hers)~.
...While I intend to be gracious in defeat and doubtless seeing me nude is part of the punishment process, I am still accustomed to getting my way.
What a mystery this hand is...
Oh... well. I can win, but isn't every round of this game a win, in some way?
Ah... not quite the hand I wished for. But I know my defeat shall nonetheless make someone else happy.
Indecisive opportunities are the most curious, are they not?
If you were hoping I had a bad hand... I may need to tease you a bit longer.
My oh my... what do we have here?
Myon~ ♪
Well... this shall certainly be interesting!
Certainly not the worst hand...
...While I intend to be gracious in defeat and doubtless seeing me nude is part of the pampering process, I am still accustomed to getting my way.
Hm... would you find it enriching if I were to say I'm just as excited to see what happens next as you?
Myon~ ♪
Ah... a middle of the road hand. I suppose life, like cards, is what we make of it, neh?
While I do not enjoy lying, I believe that is part of the experience of this game? If so, I will say that my hand shall remain a mystery.
I'm being polite by not showing you my cards. They're well and truly that good.
Were you to know the true nature of my cards, they'd shatter your world.
Myon!? This hand is the opposite of what one expects to provide punishment!
...Even with almost a millennium of experience, I suppose I still have much to learn.
...MMMMMMMMMMM...
Ah... oh no. Defeat looks like Senko...
Hm. While I may be about to lose, I think I understand you a bit better. You like a bit of a chase before you're taken care of? How very curious you picked a fox demigod for such a pursuit...
...I suppose there truly is not much more of myself I can show you, but if this is what you want, I suppose it's what you'll be getting.
...If this were further along in the punishment, you would be quite saddened for me to falter at the finish, wouldn't you?
Ah... fuck.
I-I'm not sure what you're talking about. These hands are perfectly salvageable.
I'd say my hand is not so good... but my hands are perfect for gripping and twisting. Myo~n~♪
Myon!? This hand is the opposite of what one expects from being pampered!
...Even with almost a millennium of experience, I suppose I still have much to learn.
...MMMMMMMMMMM...
Ah... oh no. Defeat looks like Senko...
Hm. While I may be about to lose, I think I understand you a bit better. You like a bit of a chase before you're taken care of? How very curious you picked a fox demigod for such a pursuit...
...Oh. This is not the start I expected.
Goodness... this hand is not the best by any extent of the imagination.
Ah... if my undressing will make you feel loved, then I shall do so gracefully.
...I suppose there truly is not much more of myself I can show you, but if this is what you want, I suppose it's what you'll be getting.
...If this were further along in the pampering, you would be quite saddened to falter at the finish, wouldn't you?
Ah... darn.
I-I'm not sure what you're talking about. These hands are perfectly salvageable.
I'd say my hand is not so good... but my hands are perfectly soft and warm. Myo~n~♪

Perhaps if you let me cook you some proper meals, Erufuda, you could have a form more to your liking. As it stands, there's no reason to try to change your body, with how naturally beautiful and confident you are.
Shapeshifting is quite challenging... I'm glad you were able to return to your former size, Jura... or perhaps they're even larger?
I actually just love music where humans weave the sounds of their technology into it... a purring engine, a horn... the pluck of a bow...
M-Megumin? Y-you didn't just kill a bunch of things because they gave you more power, did you? Y-you might really be a demon...
W-what? You'd destroy that many lives for power? Y-you might truly be a demon!
(He hit his what on the door? I've heard it called morning wood, but this is ridiculous!)
C-Chun-Li's... it's... such tail strength.
Chara, you know you can simply ask. There's no need to brood, and everyone is deserving of love and care... is there something aside from unrelenting victory that I could provide you?
Oh, I see... you weren't done. Or maybe you want me to take that off your hands for you?

Yuri... it takes a strong person in pain to not take it out on others. Please. Let me know how I can tend to that hurt. You're a lovable, smart, complex young woman with her whole life ahead of her. I think you're very resilient.
So... you said you model? Do you model petite clothing? You seem more of an artistic variety, but it's wonderful that women of our size can be viewed as attractive and feminine, neh?
No, no service, Laevatein. Your joy is all that I ask.
I only ask that you cherish your own company, Laevatein.
...You haven't been subtle, but... it was a surprise. Of a sort.
What kind of ruins would these be? I miss quite a few old shrines that have fallen into disrepair...
Oh... you... you really meant that. And... goodness. Amy. I promise you an abundance of hugs following this game.
That's... you sweet girl. Nobody should bear that. Please. After this game, you may fluff my tail as I hold you.
That seems quite awful, Galatea. I merely have to contend with hermits upset with the weather...
I have had rather demanding hosts, so... I can relate. Just not so literally, Galatea.
That much was obvious. I have a nose for pampering, you know...
A sale? What a perfect time to buy fried tofu. I imagine I could get a discount if you wanted some as well, Yusuke.
A sale, hm? Well, how about I treat you to something, Yusuke?
Well... I can't change into anything I want. I can turn into a fox, or like this, but... it takes quite a bit of work to change "this" way of appearing. Do you have a similar power?
Ah, yes. I can assume a fox form, or this one. I can change each a bit, but it's rather challenging, especially this one. Are you able to be something else, Spooky?
Myon~! Aoba, I can't help but notice you looking my way. Is there something you want to ask?
Aoba, you don't have to stare. I'm more than happy to answer any questions you have, especially the kind that set your mind at ease.
Aoba, I must ask... have you used one of those lewd wand massagers? I felt it would be too obvious with my last host, though my friend Shiro claims they're rather... climatic.

...People assume you're quite a bit younger than you actually are, hrm? Don't you find that incredibly patronizing? It's a bit like... "goodness, I have children older than you," you know?
Or maybe not.
I mean this in a general question and not an invitation, but... do you intend to invite one of the other players home with you, Aoba? I'm still considering it, myself.
Ah, Aoba! You're a modern woman with some sense of decorum. Would you say there's anything fun that someone could do after a game like this that I might not be familiar with?
You rather seem to enjoy my tail, Aoba. If you were to be a hengeyokai... what manner of animal would you like to be?
Ah! It's no costume. These are simply my normal clothes. And both my tail and ears are part of my body, Miss Fluttershy.
An intergalactic journey? I'm certainly lucky there's a portal and a shrine leading from the Realm of Foxes...
I think you could use a good hair brushing and a comfortable hug. Whenever you want either, I'm right here for you, Laevatein.
Oh... sweet girl. You take your time, but when you're ready for a hug and someone to brush your hair, I'll be right here, Laevatein.
Galatea... Has nobody ever given you something you asked for? Of course you have a choice to be pampered and cared for in the way you'd like. Let's start right now. How can I help you?
Oh, Lux. You're here, meeting new friends and making lifelong memories. Even if they're a bit lewd, you're still so very brave and fun to play with. I'm proud of you.

Sometimes the simple things in life are the most pleasurable, Prince. Sake and a hot spring, with amply endowed attendants are beyond my unique capacity, but doubtless you have many attendants of your own in your court, neh?
Ah... chess is a bit like shogi, isn't it? I understand completely. The calm, the focus... even without victory, a moment with friends is quite something to be treasured.
You are such a considerate friend. Giving someone joy by letting them enjoy their sources of joy...! Ah... I surely have to pamper you in such a generous way.
Ah... he seems to care for you far better than even I might be able to, Nami. You should treasure those moments.
Well, Hilda... I can certainly say that I enjoy tending to other's needs. Whether it's the mundane or the magical. I am happy to be of service.
Washing your hair? Why, of course! Do you have any preferences towards fragrance or conditioning, sir?

Hm... well, masturbation is very clearly not like sex, Fina. But... as long as you and the person you're being intimate with try your best for each other, it tends to work out.
And make sure you're both on the same page with expectations.
Hm... If you're here to learn, I'd be happy to discuss any nuance with you. I won't claim to a be a complete expert, but I've had my fair share of encounters over my long life, Fina.
I can't say that it's a trend that is beneficial for grown women like us, Megumin. A bit of... ah... grass on the field is certainly useful for our stature.
I can play a bit of the samisen, but I'm a maestro in the kitchen.
Do vocals count? I may not have the greatest voice among fox demigods, but I do love to sing!
Saki-chan, I'd happily cook you a meal. What are you in the mood for? Perhaps a cold beer and some chicken karaage?
Would fried chicken and beer be what you'd like? I could make enough for you to share with your gr-- your friends.
A hot bath after a long night on stage... perhaps with a cool, refreshing cider, Ms. Critical Darling?
Well, depending how the game goes, I wouldn't mind letting you fluff my tail while I sit next to you, Fluttershy. Would that be adequate?
Colress... that sounds rather lovely, to be honest.
Oh! Perhaps things work differently in your world. I'm over 800, Cynthia. I will earn my second tail at a thousand.
A thousand years is what kitsune in my world need before they grow an additional tail. I suppose it's not the worst to look a little younger...
What a horrible rumor! Perhaps it's just the level of trust needed before a kitsune will let someone touch her tail?

...That's terrible! I'd never let someone touch my tail without permission, and only then after we've built a great relationship... I'm not surprised people allowed to touch a kitsune tail are enamored but what a misrepresentation!
It's true! Fried tofu is incredibly popular. It's simple, accessible, and tastes good. What a great way to praise an agricultural goddess!
Ah... well... if romance isn't your interest tonight... I'm sure I can help you cite a brand new source.
All I know, Wikipe-tan... is that this is a place full of people in need of tender love and care.
Ah... well... if romance isn't your interest tonight... I'm sure I can help you cite a brand new source.
Oh? Are you interested in knowledge or information...? Because human semen...
Well... I'm sure you're in for quite the experience. If you're an avatar... have you ever taken a mortal consort?
Goodness, Wikipe-tan... have you ever taken a mortal consort? I'm sure someone could deposit all sorts of variety in you...
Goodness... Amy, you have such a hauntingly beautiful voice...
Oh... that voice is... entrancing. You have such a rich tone, Amy!
No dark secrets that are particularly exciting, I fear. I have on occasion overindulged on shrine offerings.
The worst secret I can think of is on occasion, I overindulge in eating shrine offerings... instead of sharing them.

Ah... family's such an interesting thing to a spirit! I rather value the other kitsune, and love my hosts and mortal children... but I wouldn't think of myself and my relationships in the same way a human does.
Familial bonds are slightly different for fox demigods... while I have loved many hosts, and even have mortal children, my other fox demigods are more like colleagues than siblings or parents.
Truth is preferable to lies... but sometimes a little lie can save great pain.
Over my life, I've found that the truth is most useful when seasoned with smaller lies to make the harsh truths of the world more easily acceptable.
A pipe full of tobacco can ease one's spirit. While luxuries shouldn't be overindulged, I think that celebrating with a cigar or pipe is something to be savored.
Who am I to shame someone for enjoying a luxury at the end of a hard day? I would most happily help pack a fine pipe for a host if they requested.

In truth, I know very little about the value of currency, but a million of anything seems quite formidable. I'd likely spend it trying to make others feel contented. ...But were they when the money was made?
Oh... that really gets my tail up! Of course people should be forgiven. To make mistakes is how people learn and grow, and people should be comforted.

I think that making mistakes is a normal part of life, and one that should be addressed, not condemned. I take great offense to anyone who assumes other people must always be perfect. That's just childish!

Going through the... ah. You mean to be someone's mistress? While I've considered it, I'd find that pampering one person at the expense of another's happiness to be far too shameful. But... it is a darkly erotic concept, isn't it?
I find a dimly lit room, lit by my foxfire, is by far the most intimate environment. It adds a sense of closeness and mystery that just makes me... myon~
A room lit only by the sense of each other and my foxfire is my preferred lighting. It makes everything beautiful, and mysterious.
My body is rather... small. Everywhere. To avoid being too sore after an intimate encounter, I prefer to be on top and control the pace.

Controlling the pace from on top is my preferred position. If I'm on the bottom... my tail and my body provide more than a few opportunities to be rather sore in a non-preferable way the morning after. Or day.
Hm... I don't often find a host I engage with in... frequent intimate matters. But when I'm... er... when the season is right, I become rather insatiable.
I... while I'd like to say as often as my partner would like, I tend to have a slower need for intimacy than humans... until it becomes... ah, my season. Then I... become rather insatiable...
I find it easy to pamper multiple hosts at once, but most people feel rather offended, even without sex, to know you're caring for someone else's needs...
While I've yet to partake of it myself, some of my acts are recorded in rather erotic murals of my own...
In the past, I have one or two well-regarded woodcuts of my erotic skills... but I've yet to enjoy modern "pornography."
In truth, such an arrangement seems ideal. While I rather love taking care of people, to lean entirely on one person seems rather unfair... when carried on indefinitely.

I'd much rather spend that time with a partner, were I so engaged. I can be rather persuasive, besides. I've spent enough time with my own fingers inside me. I'd much rather someone else's, at very least.
Myon!? Bernadetta, are you okay!?
G-goodness! Bernadetta, are you well? Do you need aid?
Ah, a... Vastaya? No, I'm a kitsune. Is that another type of fox demigod?
Well, my tail is rather fluffy, but I'm not sure what that is, Lux. I'm a fox demigod, or a kitsune.
I do strongly prefer men... but it seems we're going to have quite a few discoveries tonight!
Goodness... quite a bit of curiosity tonight, don't you think? I imagine some of you are in for a delightful learning about yourself.
So many kemonomimi here tonight...!
Ah... I love everyone's ears. It's so unusual to see anything but other fox demigods!
G-goodness. I'm still so dressed and the rest of you...
My oh my... I didn't expect to be playing so well, all things considered.
Ah... I hope I'm at least an enjoyable sight, even though I haven't played well.
Goodness... I'm not particularly offended at losing, but I do wish I had played a better game.
Out of curiosity, does anyone have a preferred indulgence, or way they wish to be taken care of?
What makes you feel loved and special? How do you like to be pampered? What does that look like for each of you?
I speak a lot about pampering... but it's truly just about making you feel loved and special.
Out of curiosity, does anyone have a hated punishment, or way they dislike being upbraided?
What do each of you find inflicts the most suffering? What causes the greatest pain?
I know that it's a spooky time of year... What fears might I stoke in you? What punishments might you find threatening?
My, oh my... this ~background~ is quite comfy, isn't it?
What a wonderful day to play cards. I'm so pleased to be playing with you!
Ah! I just had a great idea. What if we ordered a delightful meal, or when someone loses, they also need to bring something delicious... besides themselves, of course!
Oh--! Your auras are so bright and happy--! Please, let me know how I can keep making this better.
This game is rather fun, neh? Though, I believe you can always find fun where you look for it with a smile.
While this game is quite lewd, there's no reason we can't simply enjoy the wonderful company as well, neh?
(So many personalities here. I'd better look my best!)
Ah... don't you enjoy the feeling of fresh clothes after a hot bath? I imagine we'll want both after this game, hm?
Are you all having fun? Please let me know if there's any way I can make this a more enjoyable experience.
Myon~ I'll be keeping these cards a secret for now, but I'm sure we're all going to have a lovely time because of them.
Goodness! I'm sensing so many spirits brightening. You're all rather excited, aren't you?
The Inventory is such a strange, wonderful place, isn't it? I think, though, you can always make things better if you focus on bringing light and comfort.

I'm surprised so many people feel anxious when playing here. It's not always the cleanest, but it's always a good time, and everyone finishes sooner or later. Now, if we could work on that cleaning...
I've heard of places like this in the Southeast Seas...! To think we get to undress in such warm, pleasant weather, near such cool, refreshing drinks.
What an exotic place we're playing today... while the game itself is so lovely, having a refreshing breeze and sweet drinks can't do anything but make it better, neh?
Sand, sunlight, and the sound of crashing waves... while I'd rather be in a swimsuit, it's well worth dusting the sand off to enjoy the moment more fully.
Isn't this a lovely day? It's worth a little extra effort to clean sand off your clothes if you can enjoy the weather and sound, hm?
In truth, I've spent very little time inside of a classroom... I hope I'm not mistaken for a student.
Despite my age, I can't imagine that I'd be mistaken for anything but a student, given my size. It's quite a curious feeling.
You can see so much from up here. But I think the best place to look is at each other.
While it's a bit dusty up here, it sure feels like there's quite a few positive memories people have made over lunch. I wish I'd brought one for each of you. Maybe next time?
Ah, what a nice pool. We could always strip down, spend the day swimming, and enjoy the warmth of tired muscles and fun company, can't we?
Ah... I love to take a nice long swim. I know we really ought to wear swimsuits... but perhaps we can all enjoy feeling perfectly natural in this manmade pool?
A hotspring? Goodness. Whoever planned this game is really going out of their way to provide a pleasurable environment, hm?
Ah, make sure you've cleaned off before you enjoy the hot spring. Getting it dirty'll make it harder to relax in.
A warm fire, a cup of hot tea... falling snow outside. All you need is a cozy blanket and someone to snuggle you, right?
Ah... I'd love to snuggle up and watch the snow fall. What a cozy hall, here.
Oh my! Is there an orange room? I may be a bit more comfortable there. And ultimately, we all want to be comfy, don't we?
Ah! How romantic! While I tend to focus on taking care of the body, the heart is part of that, isn't it? I love this rooftop!
Oh my! This place is so romantic! Nothing makes the heart soar like someone showing you you're loved, right?
So... are we going to get dirty, or get clean together? I'm happy to scrub your back!
My tail gets rather... sad... in water. But if you help me dry it off, I'd be happy to give you a massage after you're nice and steamy!
It's so loud in here! My ears are rather sensitive... but if you're having fun so will I!
Don't be scared, ~player~. While we're in a spooky forest, I can keep you safe.
Do you need a hug? This place is so scary, but a little love goes a long way, doesn't it?
Ah, we're all a little skinny tonight! Shall we enjoy a nice, delicious meal together?
I can't help but we're all a bit... I can tell we have room for a bit of extra food tonight, neh?

I can see how hard you work, and wish I could help.

It's much too small to keep your dress up, but it is rather cute! Maybe you'd like a big, fluffy obi? Or would that be too formal...
Meia... No, it's all about the satisfaction of a job well done, there's no need for payment in coin!
Payment...? Myon... No, the only payment I get is that of a satisfied recipient of my care!
I'm not rattled. Like I said, my goal is to provide a good, thorough punishment.
Well, it sure is cute. And cute is what you aim for, ~name~, even if you miss the target.
Ara ara... small, but mighty, neh? I wonder how long your resolve will last.
Can you promise to teach me how to do this-- t-the game later, just us women?
Y-you really had me, ~name~. And not in the way some people want sometimes...
G-goodness! An accessory! At this point. It's not arousing, nor is it... myo~n~...
I'm always so interested in how women wear their ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~.
Goodness! Speaking as a small person, do not underestimate the power within one's frame...!
It's nice that your ~clothing~ looked so good on you. Though... it must be nice to take off your accessories after a long, hard day, neh?
O-Oh! Your ~clothing~... I don't believe ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ as cute as... my underwear... but it's still very nice!
Do you find it true that your ~clothing~, and accessories like it, are the things you most easily get attached to, ~name~?
Goodness! ~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ looked so much part of your appearance that I'd hardly considered you may remove ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~!
I'm not rattled. Like I said, my goal is to provide a good, thorough pampering.
Well, it sure is cute. And cute is what you aim for, ~name~.
Ara ara... small, but mighty, neh?
Miss Hilda... your breasts are rather impressive. Are you perhaps trying to distract your competitors?
Miss Hilda... are you trying to impress everyone with your breasts...? You need not lend yourself so quickly to distraction...
Though, the only demon being sealed here is inside your loins, I believe.
Miss Florina, you seem rather skittish. Are you sure you would not rather some other way of being entertained?
~Player~, don't you think we could do something nice for Chara? She's certainly trying to give you a challenge, don't you think?
Well, I'm sure you and I are due for many additional interesting conversations, Amy.
Well, Amy, allow me to formally greet you and welcome you to relax while we're here.
Oh, Susie... you don't deserve to be feeling so shadowed. I hope we can make you feel better tonight.
A young woman like you shouldn't be in nearly as much conflict as you are...
I want you to know I take no pleasure in you being bested, Prince.
It would seem you've been... out-foxed, Prince.

Burn some sandalwood, soak you in the tub, and bring you out all warm and refreshed into a soft robe! Has anyone ever done that for you? You certainly look like you could use some attention and comforting.
O-Oh my? Pampering both of you? Simultaneously?
Well. Why don't you introduce yourself as you'd like to be seen, Galatea? And I will happily pamper you to make it so.
~Player~, don't you think we could do something nice for Chara? She's trying so hard to help you win.
Ah... I think I have a few things that are a bit more mundane than winning entirely. ~Player~, won't you help me pamper Chara?
Please do not hesitate to call on me. The very least I can do is tend to your armor.
You just let me know what I can do for you, okay? Would a massage, or buffing your armor help?
I mean no disrespect, but I can tell I'm not the only woman here who's older than she looks. We can appreciate some well-tempered wisdom and honesty, can't we?
You'd be happier if you focused on your bond with ~player~, Chara.
You've sacrificed so much for ~player~... would you enjoy being the prize for once, Chara?
I don't quite understand but the melody is entrancing.
Myon~! It is a rather lovely song.
If you wish to share, I'm all ears, Amy-chan. But I will not press the point further.
If you are most certain, Amy-chan. But... I meant it honestly when I'd listen to anything you wished to share.
Oh... I meant more simple pleasures. A back massage, polishing your firearms, or perhaps mending any rips in your pants?
I meant something simple.... like washing your clothes, or perhaps bringing you a fresh pipe of tobacco, or even a frosty beer?
(I've met people with less shame, but she's so... sad about all of it.)
(Desperation isn't worth fixing...)
Woe-betide those who underestimate our combined might!
Though our frames may be small, our power is immense!
You're an adventurer, so doubtless you've come to enjoy a wide variety of new experiences. This will surely be one of them.
I wouldn't fret too much. This place is a chance to enjoy new experiences.
Perhaps, for a truly special occasion, we ought to arrive in nothing but our underwear, neh?
My mind did wonder if you would require aid in removing that.
...Though I was going to answer if you needed help taking it off. It seems... unwieldy.
I wanted to play a nice game of cards. And undress. Maybe make love. But how am I to measure up to this?
Myon!? N-not forcefully! Just by doing the traditional things-- compliments, a healthy meal, whatever you'd like, Komi-san!
I just recognize a fellow woman in need, that's all.
I'd really appreciate that, Angela. I have a feeling we're going to know each other quite well!
Would reading you a book be soothing as well? I may not quite read you like one, but I could read one to you.
Meia... it's simply an act of kindness. It's not for any price save your time.
I mean sincerely when there's no charge at all. Simply ask if you need help or would like some attention!
Are you quite certain? I imagine I could care for you in some ways that you might not be accustomed...
Everyone says that, yet my brand of care is quite... Well, it's far from the modern mores of care, certainly.
I'm struck by how... How frustrating this is. You make it damnably hard not to compliment you...
My oh my! Perhaps it's my state of undress, but... your skill and beauty are quite evident! It... ah... makes me very vengeful.
...I was more than happy to acknowledge your skill, ~name~... insults are a form of punishment, after all.
I've seen quite a few things. But a woman's ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~ may change with the times, but never the way she wears ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
I certainly enjoy what I see. Please continue your best of efforts.
Well, they say that no matter how many accessories you wear, the best thing in a woman's wardrobe is her confidence!
...My choice of undergarments is more appealing than ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ mere ~clothing~, yes...?
While I very easily could remove it, I believe it would be better to retain my iconic look and keep my charm in my hair...
Ah... well... I did rather enjoy ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~... but perhaps it's more fun to fold...
I believe that the view of me is quite a bit better than ~name~...
I'm only slightly bothered at the loss of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ compared to my state of undress.
O-Oh! It's... goodness. I'm struck by how beautiful you are, regardless of your accessorization!
My oh my! Perhaps it's my state of undress, but... your skill and beauty are quite evident!
...I was more than happy to acknowledge your skill, ~name~... compliments are a form of pampering, after all.
I-I just suppose this leaves you in an adequate place to be taken care of...
Why... g-goodness!
Myon~... Am--I am performing adequately, am I not? W-would a more direct approach have been preferable?
Ah, will you be covering yourself with it? I find the idea quite appealing.
I may be a rather old lady by your standards... but that type of display, of holding your hat over your heavenly spear...
Ah... a nice renegade in need of some love?
Well, impetuous as you are, I find a lawless, rambling sort the best to just pamper senseless.
You seem like a man who needs a bit of the finer things in life. A great hand...
Starting with a nice hand, I imagine you're a man who enjoys a life of luxury, but rarely immerses himself.
While I am an immortal demigod fox-- er... oni, I do have a substantial appreciation for the mortal form. It's far more fragile than that of the supernatural.
Normally, I'd punish a single person... but seeing as I am a single person, I'd love the chance to indulge myself in indulging others... and their flesh.
My hearing is quite sensitive... so I can hear your heartbeat, ~name~... Is that fear, I hear?
Oh... we're going for something interesting now, are we? I'll have you know I'm very good at chains. And Whips.
Many oni take on mortal consorts... but you have to be awfully impressive. And it tends not to last.
Myon! I don't suppose there's a Ms. ~Name~? If there is... Why, I'm sure she'd appreciate the opportunity to punish you for being here.
O-oh...! Well... I am immortal... this means I've picked up quite a few... tricks for punishment, you know. With or without my tail.
You may fluff my tail. If you do not value your life.
Goodness! You look a bit tense. Would you like a scalding tub? Whips across your muscles? A cold cup of mysterious fluid?
Don't you want to take that big, heavy ~clothing~ off? You really ought to settle in. Enjoy the view...
Myon~ and to think that I cook and clean, too...
My oh my... would it help if I hung up your ~clothing~ for you?
While I am an immortal demigod fox, I do have a substantial appreciation for the mortal form.
Normally, I'd pamper a single person... but seeing as I am a single person, I'd love the chance to indulge myself in indulging others...
My hearing is quite sensitive... so I can hear your heartbeat, ~name~...
Oh... we're going for something interesting now, are we? I'll have you know I'm very good at laundry... and massage.
Many fox spirits take on mortal consorts... but you have to be awfully impressive.
Myon! I don't suppose there's a Ms. ~Name~? II there is, please make sure she pampers you!
O-oh...! Well... I am immortal... this means I've picked up quite a few... tricks for pampering, you know. With my tail.
You may fluff my tail. If it pleases you.
Goodness! You look a bit tense. Would you like a hot bath? A massage? A cold cup of alcohol?
The offer to maintain your apparel... or your self... still stands, Fate.
Ohoh~ You could use a lot of care. But let's start with your clothes.
I'm sure I can find some way to make your losses worthwhile.
...Soft robes, lovingly prepared meals, a warm bath overlooking a beautiful sunset... Other things.
I appreciate your contribution to the game, but you know that I don't mind taking care of you...
Life is too short not to enjoy it, neh?
Hm... that's one less thing to stop me from pampering you. Surrender already, if you'd please~
I hope you don't mind an old lady like me flirting with you, ~name~. It's all in good fun, and you should really indulge yourself in a game like this.
Kekeke~ Don't mind me, ~name~. I have many skills. Providing a fun experience is one of them, even if it's harmless.
Ah... well then. Consider it part of the experience. Relax, ~name~. I'd happily bring you a drink.
...Hm... I suppose there's always more to do, isn't there?
The joy of life is that you never stop getting to enjoy even the changes that come about.
I'm right here when you need me, ~name~. All I ask is for your respect.
Good boy.
If you would be so kind as to show off more...
Goodness. Please take care of your ~clothing~, and who knows what may end up taking care of you.
O-oh! Why... good job, Lady Lyndis?
Miss Florina! Your tunic!
F-Florina, you're tearing your lovely tunic!
Ah... well, should you need any pampering...
Are you certain? You poor dear.
And I see Mistress Tojiko will also be joining us.
And you as well, Mistress Tojiko.
Ah. Well, I know a thing or two, and I know a woman like you could use some tender love and care!
I hope you don't mind me saying so, but I believe you of all people could use a little pampering.

state.text: So, please. Anything you need. I'm right here for you. Leave your worries with me and let me pamper you.

case.state: Ah. Well, a kitsune comforts, and you share the knowledge of humanity. Both are things of beauty, though I'm truly envious of you.
You aren't exactly human yourself, are you, Penny? You are quite beautiful, though.
You're a beautiful young woman, Penny... but you aren't fully human, are you?
While I believe you're enjoying yourself, you seem to have a heaviness in your aura...
Your aura is quite... it has a certain heaviness, despite the fact you're having fun, or seeming to.
You can choose to talk about it later, if you want.
I'd like to let you rest on my lap and tell me the rest.
I'm an excellent cook. Perhaps while you lounge in the tub, I could whip you up a hot, restoring meal?
I'll have you know that I'm quite the cook! And you can't run forever without food to help you get strong!
(Catria probably knows she's showing her seat like that... best to let her play coy.)
(An intriguing strategy! To show her largest asset and then pretend not to have. Curious!)
You may move as you like! I've known jinn who moved swifter than summer storms, and it seems you have their energy, Shantae!
I'm rather entranced by your dance! I've known many jinn who moved like you. It's not at all a hard thing to tell your heritage.
Well, playing a game like this with people eager to compliment you can help you feel at ease, neh?
Ah, I understand, you're trying to build your own bravery, neh?
Goodness... I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to offend--
My sincerest of apologies, Saki-chan, did I offend--
I'm somewhat skilled with the samisen, but perhaps I could help you clean and organize your wardrobe? It would certainly be less mismatched...
Oh... people skills? Hm... I suppose it all begins by thinking about what you'd like to have done for yourself, then do it for others.
Hm... what types of punishment do you like least, ~name~?
Just imagine you're waking up to a long, challenging day, with no respite.
Do you think I'd look good in your ~clothing~, ~name~? I've often considered a more modern look, and I doubt you'll need it after this game.
At this stage... well, I could use some punishment too...
Goodness... look at the effect you're having on me, ~name~... You've been terribly naughty.
~Name~... you look quite exceptionally beautiful. And you can always trust an oni not to consume your soul!
Hm... what types of pampering do you most like, ~name~?
Just imagine it as the end of the day, and you're coming home to a warm meal and a nice, easy night!
Do you think I'd look good in your ~clothing~, ~name~? I've often considered a more modern look.
Please, make sure that whoever Mr. ~Name~ is is as good to you as you are to your ~clothing~, ~name~!
While your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ cute, I think the cutest part of your defeat is yourself.
Since you're taking off your ~clothing~, it seems only fair we make it worth your time.
My primary abilities are domestic... but intimate matters are nonetheless rather important, regardless of... the person, hm?
In having lived 800 years, I've had more than a few encounters with a woman...
Hm... though I do fully appreciate your ~clothing~, I wish you to know the woman underneath holds quite a bit more interest to me at this stage of the game.
At this stage... well, I could use some pampering too... visually, at the very least!
Goodness... look at the effect you're having on me, ~name~...
~Name~... you look quite exceptionally beautiful. And you can always trust a kitsune!
Of course, Jessie. I simply wished to compliment you. I often get assumed to be a different age than I actually am.
Experienced women like ourselves rarely get the respect we deserved.
Princess, your hair's a bit of a mess... but might I brush it?
Oh. I see. Hm.
Ah... I suppose that kind of pampering is what you're here for.
I suppose playing with the two of you will be quite the edifying experience.
Ah... well, it's always interesting to hear how a couple pampers each other, as well.
I'm sure you're in for quite the delight during and after this game, Laevatein!
Fufufu~ I can see that you're a woman trying her best. And that means you deserve to be loved, cherished, and taken care of!
We can take it slowly if you like. I'm certain you'll want a warm washcloth at the end of the game, at the very least.
You have knowledge in abundance. Are you here to learn a... ah, practical degree of romance?
Perhaps you're interested in... well. You are at this card game, dear.
My... well... what do you want from this game, dear?
Well... I'm here to talk, if you want.
While your music is soothing, maybe you just want someone to talk to about your day, Amy?
I-I did not intend for that. I merely hoped to help you relax and speak about your woes.
T-though it is a game of the carnal variety, p-perhaps something more platonic would suffice?
Ah, no. I'm a kitsune. But I have a few children of my own that are half-mortal.
Ah, no, as you can see, I'm not a genie. But I do have a few half-mortal children that would be several years your senior.
B-Bernadetta, you may wish to slow down!
Goodness... Is being called cute simply all you live for? I can compliment you more, should you like.
I see. You'd have a rather hard time accepting help, is that so?
Ah... you're very much pushing the envelope, hm?
Ah, it's intentional! Very well, I suppose you can at least say you taught me something tonight, Ms. Critical Darling.
Your outfit is certainly different from what I'd expect, but if it makes you happy, I'd be happy to help you mismatch it!
Hm... if you have a friend that's a bit scattered, maybe you could help her by taking some things off her plate, or indulging her with a hobby she likes?

Maybe a friend of yours would love it if you cooked together. You have to be careful not to do it your way and not hers... but I'm sure doing something someone else loves together is a great way to pamper them.

Perhaps you've got someone who's used to being in control, and constantly responsible for other people... someone like that would love it if you'd ask how you could help. Maybe she could use a chance to rest, right?
A friend who's a little down might like some flowers, or the offer to simply take a short phone call to tell her a joke. Something like that.
Ah... good to meet you, Cupil. I trust you're keeping Fina safe?
Well, it's a pleasure to meet another guest tonight. How are you, Cupil?
Hm... well... relaxation provides its own unique opportunities, don't you think so, ~name~? Be careful where you rest your head, though...
Goodness... to think you looked pretty before you took off your ~clothing~! You'd best be careful not to frustrate me too much, ~name~.
Myon~! Well... I'm more used to physical punishment. But you're certainly teaching me something new, ~name~...!
Myon~! You may wish to keep going. I'm already providing quite a bit of my own pampering to the others, neh? A punishment might yet transpire.
Ah... your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ quite interesting... something that makes you--hahh--feel good should be considered, hm? It makes the punishment that follows more... enlightening.
I do know how to maintain a fire... both for cooking... and... just how you're doing, ~name~. If you aren't careful, you may find yourself immolated.
Well, I'm certain no matter what your inclinations are, I'd be happy to help you!
Hm... though your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ interesting, perhaps something like your choice of sushi would yet be more so?
~Clothing~... Hm... I do wonder how ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~ would look like on me. Or... perhaps more traditional apparel for you, to help you feel elegant?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(deserve|deserves)~ care, ~name~. But not as much as you!
You're having fun, yes? While not all of life must be abundantly exciting, it is made better by moments like this, myon~?
Well, well! You're provoking such curious reactions, ~name~! Perhaps... there is quite a bit of merit to your approach.
Hm... well... relaxation provides its own unique opportunities, don't you think so, ~name~?
Goodness... to think you looked pretty before you took off your ~clothing~! You'd best be careful not to pamper me too much, ~name~.
Myon~! Well... I'm more used to physical pampering. But you're certainly teaching me something new, ~name~...!
Myon~! You may wish to keep going. I'm already providing quite a bit of my own pampering to the others, neh?
Ah... your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ quite interesting... something that makes you--hahh--feel good should be considered, hm?
I do know how to maintain a fire... both for cooking... and... just how you're doing, ~name~.
Oh-ho? Well, a compliment paid in kind is indeed quite the form of pampering, isn't it?
There's no need to flatter me, Jessie. But I appreciate the respectful confidence.
I can fix up your pants, if you'd like. But whatever would we do while you're out of them, I wonder?
Well, joining a semi-dressed kitsune is an act of self-care.
Oh... I have a feeling where you'd like to be punished, hm? Right there?
My oh my... we might have to get you into a bath if you're going to get naked. Or perhaps you'd prefer the massage table? I assure you... We'll certainly set your nerves alight.
Goodness! If you wanted things to get steamy, I could have simply poured you a bath...
O-Oh? Of course. It's merely like coming home at the end of a long day, neh?
G-goodness! I'll make sure to take good care of your ~clothing~.
Well, joining a semi-dressed kitsune is an act of self-care.
Oh... I have a feeling where you'd like to be pampered, hm?
My oh my... we might have to get you into a bath if you're going to get naked. Or perhaps you'd prefer the massage table?
Well, joining a semi-dressed kitsune is an act of self-care.
It was quite a delight when I undressed. I suppose we do owe you the same attention.
Myo~n~!
Ah... I... had been wondering. S-surely curiosity is a normal part of the game, hm?
Myo~n~!
Hyoung--!
Myooo~n~
Hmm-mmh!
Do not be upset simply because I'm still mostly dressed. You will doubtless have further chances to play!
Defeat is part of the experience. Please do not be upset to be behind...
Ah... ~name~. Please tell me you're still having fun!
...I'm being plenty attended to with the view.
Hm... would you be interested in perhaps fluffing my tail?
(~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would drape over me... would that be cute, though?)
Perhaps you should keep going. Then you might be able to get some particular care.
Goodness. I live to serve, but I think views like this make it much easier.
My oh my... getting quite warm in here? Do you need a cool drink? Or someone to wipe you down?
Poor girl. Here, give me that when you're done with it.
There's no ulterior motives, Laevatein. While I do find you cute, I'm much more interested in your health and wellness than anything you could do for me.
Oh, don't worry, Penny. I can take care of you however you want.
However you'd like me to tend to you, Penny. Don't worry.
I see... that's a lot for a young woman to go through.
Oh... that does seem like a lot... for a young woman such as yourself.
Amy, you're about to-- hold on a moment, this is worth the attention but--
A-Amy, I'm listening but you're taking off--
Miss Dash, given how intensely you work out, perhaps you'd like it if I gave your legs a massage?
Would it be helpful to you if I gave you a leg massage after the game, Miss Dash?
Intimacy is but one of the many ways someone can show love and care, don't you agree?
Intimacy at the physical and emotional level is certainly a worthwhile endeavor. That you can provide it to so many is quite the wonderful pursuit!
...But, admittedly, some more modern techniques in my inventory would doubtless go a long way for special partners.
For someone special, though, I'd gladly learn a bit from you. Any advice?
Ah! In a hurry to entertain, are you? I suppose the others will have to enjoy you for speed, and myself for haste.
You're in a rather hurry to show off, aren't you? I suppose that's a genuine form of giving others something beautiful to watch, hm?
Ah, trying to put on a good show, Pinkie?
If I'd known you were in such a hurry, I'd have taken even more time, Pinkie!
Oh? Special lingerie for the game, perhaps?
Oh! That dress does look rather complicated. Would you like an assistance in tailoring it?
I prefer to care for mere mortals, rather than heroes like you. But... it doesn't mean I wouldn't mind being part of a legend of my own some day!
I think a nice, snug pair of panties is actually rather comforting. Back, many years ago, I used to have to rely on silk or cotton wrappings, of all things.
Oh my! If it helps, you'll doubtless be on your way to enjoyable new experiences soon!
I've always been fairly good at games, but this is far from my specialty...
Oh! Surely you're just choosing to get more comfortable, ~name~?
Well, well. Do you think you can compete with your elders, ~name~?
Heh.
You're looking a bit like the laundry, ~name~. Ready to be set at rest after you get nice and wet.
This is quite liberating, ~name~. It's nice to see that you're joining me!
My... this may not be a new experience... but there's something appealing in the familiar...
Disrobing your ~clothing~ is the first step to some of the best pampering you can get, ~name~!
Myon~!
Ah... well... sometimes one is the mood for something a bit different, neh?
I will endeavor to bring you a soothing tea and a comfortable blanket for later.
I will return shortly with an herbal tea. And a toasty blanket for later.
Your happiness is more than enough. Even if your breasts are rather cute.
An impressive garb for an impressive young woman.
Goodness... to be young again. Doubtless you're quite primed to deal with the youthful endurance of any companion you'd so choose, neh?
I'll have you know that I'm feeling rather distracted, Hilda.
Goodness. I have children older than you, and yet I find myself distracted. Curse this inhuman libido...
...In many ways, you're more human than I am.
Despite my experiences... you're quite a bit more human than me. It's natural that I'd wish to tend to you.
I'm far older than you. And weren't you just complaining about that very topic?
Was that very topic not a cause of alarm for you? I'm very much your senior...
I'm an expert at cleaning up messes, and you certainly are not one of them!
You are not a mess! And I won't tolerate anyone acting like you are!
You'd doubtless have been a high-ranked courtesan in the ancient eras. Perhaps modern sensibilities afford you more freedom, though...?
Doubtless you'd have been quite an accomplished and favored courtesan in the era I was born... but you're quite liberated on your own, aren't you?

I've dressed as a maid on occasion... but your undergarments are quite fantastic! I can almost, but not quite, see everything. You're truly a master of seduction, mistress. I-I mean, a mistress of seduction.
Practical and alluring at the same time. Goodness, I'm going to learn from an expert party-planner tonight, aren't I?
Ah! I see. What a lovely strategy, Pinkie Pie.
Goodness, Pinkie Pie, way to out-pamper me!
Scars... oh... Yuri. You're so very strong to endure so much.
To endure... oh, Yuri. Your spirit must be so, so strong.
(This must be why her aura was so tainted... poor young woman.)
If they hurt, Ayano, I'd be happy to help massage the pain out. (They say a scar doesn't fade until the person who caused it stops hating you. What has Ayano suffered through?)
Ah, I see. It's part of your theming. In truth, I've worn a maid outfit once or twice. And as for the lingerie, perhaps that's a mystery worth exploring, neh?
Nonsense! It just shows how durable you are, Misato!
I... and to think, you held out almost to the very last...
After almost a whole game, you're... you're truly...
Your underwear does look rather cute! I'm always jealous of modern convenience... but I suppose I'm not too old to be stuck in my ways.
Well, you do have a few pieces left, don't you? Perhaps I can offer you a massage, later?
Myon~!
While I don't intend to throw the game away, I do want you to know you make defeat look appealing!
A little taunting isn't exactly polite, but it is fun, right?
I'm not certain why, but I am beginning to feel a bit... shy.
It's rather nice to not need to worry about someone else's ~clothing~ except that they remove it.
I'm mostly used to men, but it never hurts to have a range of experiences to draw on.
Ah... aren't you a beautiful sight, ~name~.
Goodness...! The spirit of competition and pampering are encouraging me to be rather bold...
~Name~...
Oh... oh my...
I-is this...? Please continue, ~name~, and appreciate the attention.
Though, perhaps a satisfying meal, then the feeling of having your most heavy of burdens drained to the dregs...
--Easy thing to... to take care of.
Brock! Are you okay!
Oh no! Brock! Are you okay!
Myon~!
I find it amazing how a simple bet can transform a normal event into something so intimate!
I hope you find it affirming that I remain excited to see you undress, ~name~!
Ah, and I thought I was being too subtle.
There we are. Let's get you out of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ restraining ~clothing~ so you can relax.
I'm enjoying the visual pampering already. But why settle? Let's really indulge.
